app.services

Class GroupService

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.services.DaoService<IGroupDao>
      • app.services.GroupService

  • @Service
public class GroupService
extends DaoService<IGroupDao>
    Class as service represents Group. In this class contains all possible operations with group and should be used for that.
    Author:
    Mateusz Mucha
